channel.title: Error when making a post on forums
channel.description: After i post this is what i get. I did not even post at all before. This is what I get after my first post. [IMG]http://i696.photobucket.com/albums/vv328/insanepk/jjjj.jpg[/img][br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2009, 11:03:32 pm[/size][hr]I corrected the issue. Seems to only do it on that forum name.

post on punbb/fluxbb forums/php/anywhere but here.
